metadata.title: CVE-2017-16907 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In Horde Groupware 5.2.19 and 5.2.21, there is XSS via the Color field in aCreate Task List action.

criterions.comment: php-horde: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
php-horde-core: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
